name: Dimensional Shambler
description: The Dimensional Shambler is a large aberration with the ability to instill fear and manipulate dimensions. It has a terrifying appearance that can unsettle even the bravest adventurers.
memorable: Its ability to instill fear and manipulate dimensions makes it a uniquely terrifying opponent.
goals: To inflict psychological terror and physical harm to its enemies.
relations: May be encountered with other aberrations or creatures of the Lower Planes.
environment: Often found in areas connected to the Lower Planes or in corrupted landscapes.
strengths: High hit points, strong physical attributes, and abilities to manipulate space and induce fear.
attacks: Multiattack with powerful claw strikes that can grapple foes.
most_powerful_ability: Step Between allows it to escape or reposition by shifting between planes.
senses: Possesses darkvision with a range of 60 feet and has a passive perception score of 17.
skills: Excel in arcana, athletics, stealth, and has good perception skills.
additional_information: Immunity to poison and several conditions.
Ability to see into the Lower Planes while on the Material Plane.
Causes fear in nearby creatures with its Maddening Form ability.
Can drag grappled targets through dimensions, causing psychic damage.
Strategically uses its abilities to control the battlefield.
test_queries: dimensional creature that can shift planes
